statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); branch=$(git --git-dir="$dir/.git" symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then echo "$model in $dir [$branch]"; else echo "$model in $dir"; fi
